alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lincoln County through 500 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near East Lincoln, or 9 miles east of Brookhaven, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... East Lincoln around 445 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
